synopsis.text: Robotics enthusiast Akiho Senomiya and her apathetic clubmate, Kaito Yashio, are on the brink of losing their Robot Research Club at Central Tanegashima High School. In 2019, as the world embraces the PhoneDroid and its Augmented Reality capabilities, the duo struggles to build a functional giant robot inspired by a beloved anime. While Akiho strives to preserve the club and fulfill their shared dream, Kaito is consumed by his own virtual robot fighting game. As they face the threat of disbandment, Kaito stumbles upon a cryptic message and meets Airi Yukifune, an AI hidden within the AR system. This discovery leads him to the Kimijima Report, a conspiracy with global ramifications. As the club's fate hangs in the balance, Kaito and Akiho must navigate their own ambitions and the secrets of the Kimijima Report in this captivating anime, Robotic;Notes.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
